d1_text:
Npc0102:
ï¿½I read the book called ï¿½Our Society is Convenient.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It said that these days, there are always telephones in hotels and drugstores.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I also learned that to use a green pay phone costs a dollar,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½while the black phones are free.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you weren't aware of this,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½all your money could get eaten up by your phone calls.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm glad I read that book...[HALT][END]
d1_lines: ï¿½I read the book called ï¿½Our Society is Convenient.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It said that these days, there are always telephones in hotels and drugstores.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I also learned that to use a green pay phone costs a dollar,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½while the black phones are free.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you weren't aware of this,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½all your money could get eaten up by your phone calls.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm glad I read that book...[HALT][END]
